description: Pura Fruta is a medium-sized company based in Cartagena, specializing in fruit pulp production. Founded in 1999, it has evolved from a family business into an innovative enterprise focused on sustainability. Pura Fruta aims to minimize waste by creating wines from fermented fruits and emphasizes quality over quantity. The company is dedicated to educating consumers about its products and fostering local partnerships, while also navigating challenges like transportation costs and energy supply issues.
name: Pura Fruta
